name: Woody Woodpecker
description:
Just like my popular Dictionary Collection I wanted to find a medium that I could reuse and give a second life, and that is how the book board collection came to life.

I use old children's books that have seen better days that have been used and love to the point where the spines have separated or that they have been cast aside as it owner has grown and no longer needs the book.

The coolest part of these I think is that many times when you view the art it is at second glance that you realize it is on a book board the gal just blends into her surroundings!

These can be easily framed but if you would like a wire hanging on it similar to my inspired art girls just let me know at the time of ordering, or send me an email after purchase!

name: Thrift your day away
description:
The Inspired Art series was…well, inspired...by the common need for a compassionate perspective, that while today may be a day we would do over given the chance, tomorrow is new canvas, bright and clean. That our best is good enough. That we are good enough, flaws and all.  
 	
By design, each Inspired Art Girl is painted without a face, so that whoever sees it can envision themselves within its frame. In this way each Girl becomes personal to the eye of whoever views her.

They are heartfelt gift to a friend whose car needs repairs, whose toddler has a fever, who winces at the breakfast dishes still in the sink at dinnertime, whose hundred-item to-do list keeps her awake at night.
 
They make a sweet present for the sweet daughter who tried out for the junior high swim team but didn’t make the cut. 
 
And since the pep talks we give ourselves can make the most difference, they are the perfect present from you to you.

These mixed media pieces are 6x6 in sized.  Crafted with paper, paint and whatever other goodies I might find while rummaging my supply closet.  Are secured by a wire and ready to hang.

name: Custom Inspired Art
description:
Create your own one of a kind 6x6 inspired art girl! 

You get to pick:
The background colors
The hair color
The quote

After purchase I will get in touch with you via email we will go over your requests and I will get to work.  To create your piece it will be about a 1 week lead time.  

Only have an opinion on one or two of the parts that make an inspired girl unique?  No worry I can pick out the rest for you and you can just focus on the part that most important to you!

(interested in a hoop frame instead?  Contact me and we can work out the details!)
